tool.name: anvi-delete-state
tool.description: Delete an anvi'o state from a pan or profile database.

param.name: input_pan_or_profile_db
param.label: Pan Or Profile Db
param.help: Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts).

tool.help:
usage: anvi-delete-state [-h] -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB [-s STATE_NAME] [--list-states]
Delete an anvi'o state from a pan or profile database.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB, --pan-or-profile-db PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts). -s STATE_NAME, --state STATE_NAME The state name to ... delete :( --list-states Show available states and exit.
